question: Please suggest me a dua or wazifa I should recite to seek Allah's help for getting a good job
answer:

Should I continue reciting the same dua ? or do you suggest me another dua ? I want to get into Software Quality Assurance Testing from Data entry work. Please give me a dua to get into Sofware Testing and which I will keep reciting life long insha Allah, for my overall source of income and prosperity. Jazak Allah.
ANSWER


Share:
Have firm conviction that Allah is the Sole Provider. He will provide whatever is best to you according to His infinite knowledge and wisdom. Continue reciting Surah Waaqi?ah after Maghrib and invoke the quality of Allah ?al-Razzaaq? as much as possible.

May Allah Ta?ala grant you Halaal and wholesome sustenance, Aameen.
